attributes.action: Where is my petition for an Autumn Spending Review which I submitted some weeks ago?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I submitted a petition for Gordon Brown to hold a full Autumn Spending Review and to publish the results before the next general election.

I received an email to authenticate me which I duly actioned.

Since then my petition has neither been created nor formally rejected?

As there appears to be no other way to contact the petition team I am forced to raise another petition to ask you the status of it.

Thanks.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
